head.title: Score to Open Office At Labor Department Site

hedline.hl1: Score to Open Office At Labor Department Site

abstract.p: Service Corps of Retired Executives (Score) plans to open office at New York State Department of Labor offices in White Plains, where it will offer free advice on running small businesses; logo (S)

block.p: On Tuesday, the Service Corps of Retired Executives, known as Score, will open an office in the State Department of Labor offices at 120 Bloomingdale Road in White Plains. Score offers free counseling to anyone starting or running a small business. Fifty-five volunteer counselors provide professional guidance to help fledgling business owners.
''In the 35 years we've been operating in White Plains, we've helped hundreds of people reach their goals,'' Joan Lewis, a spokeswoman, said.

On Tuesday, the Service Corps of Retired Executives, known as Score, will open an office in the State Department of Labor offices at 120 Bloomingdale Road in White Plains. Score offers free counseling to anyone starting or running a small business. Fifty-five volunteer counselors provide professional guidance to help fledgling business owners.
''In the 35 years we've been operating in White Plains, we've helped hundreds of people reach their goals,'' Joan Lewis, a spokeswoman, said.

Score also sponsors free workshops, covering different aspects of starting and expanding a small business. The workshops are held on Wednesday afternoons from 1 to 3 p.m. Office hours are daily from 9:30 a.m. to 1 p.m. Counseling is by appointment by calling 948-3907.
